sentences.en: Commit to produce creative products that are aesthetically pleasing yet encompass all of the clients requirements.
sentences.cn: 锐意生产具创意而美观的产品,但同时产品也照颅了客户的所有需求.

sentences.en: For this reason his dream was to build a boat that will encompass this philosophy.
sentences.cn: 基于这个缘由,他的梦想是建造能与其环保哲学一致的船舶.

sentences.en: Global brotherhood is much easier to encompass.
His repertoire encompassed everything from Bach to Schoenberg.
sentences.cn: 他的表演曲目从巴赫到勋伯格，样样俱全。

sentences.en: How could loyalty and reciprocity encompass all the principles of dealing with people and handling affairs?
sentences.cn: 只是[忠]和[恕]两个字,就包括一切待人处事的道理了?

sentences.en: It's such a creative outlet to encompass all those moving parts.
sentences.cn: 将那些不断移动的元素融为一体-这实在是个能好好发泄创造力的途径.

sentences.en: No single document could encompass all the shades of interpretation.
sentences.cn: 但任何一项文件也不可能把各种细微的解释全部包括进去.

sentences.en: Note that these contours do not encompass the crack tip.
sentences.cn: 注意这些围道,都不包含裂信尖端.

sentences.en: The course will encompass physics, chemistry and biology.
sentences.cn: 课程将包括物理 、 化学和生物学.

sentences.en: The flow diagram should encompass an additional page.
sentences.cn: 流程图则包含于附加页数中.

sentences.en: The imaginative capacity of the ordinary mind cannot encompass the horror of it.
sentences.cn: 普通心理的想象能力不能够包含这种恐怖.

sentences.en: The project will encompass rural and underdeveloped areas in China.
sentences.cn: 这项工程将覆盖中国的农村和不发达地区.

sentences.en: The services encompass fertility regulation, gynaecological check - up , pre - marital and pre - pregnancy preparation, menopause service and youth counselling.
sentences.cn: 服务范围包括生育指导 、 妇科检查、婚前检查、怀孕前验身 、 更年期服务和青年辅导等.

sentences.en: The sounds of life encompass his path.
sentences.cn: 他在路上只听得四面八方都是人声.

sentences.en: The study encompasses the social, political, and economic aspects of the situation.
sentences.cn: 这项研究涵盖了这一局势的社会、政治和经济三方面。

sentences.en: This definition attempts to encompass all of the various cloud approaches.
sentences.cn: 这一定义试图涵盖各种云计算观点.

sentences.en: WWII COMBATIVES. What the hell does that really encompass?
sentences.cn: 二战格斗术. 它究竟包含些什么东西?

words.tran_cn: 围绕（拥有，完成）；环绕；包含，包围

trans.tran_en: to include a wide range of ideas, subjects, etc

trans.tran_cn: 围绕，包围，包含或包括某事物，完成
trans.tran_en: to include a wide range of ideas, subjects, etc
